title: Notes on symmetries and reductions of algebraic equations
authors: Inna K. Shingareva, Andrei D. Polyanin
abstract:
Symmetries and reductions of some algebraic equations are considered.
Transformations that preserve the form of several algebraic equations, as well
as transformations that reduce the degree of these equations, are described.
Illustrative examples are provided. The obtained results and solutions can be
used as test problems for numerical methods of solving algebraic equations.
